message:
SYSTEM: Slides-Everis-2009.pdf: Página 2
2
Óscar Muñoz-García, Raúl García Castro
Motivation
How can I specify the 
semantic functionalities 
of my application?
How can I carry out the 
development process of 
my semantic application?
Semantic applications require different software development techniques.
•They manipulate huge quantities of heterogeneous decentralized information.
•They integrate semantic and non-semantic data.
•They explore different sources at run-time.
Need guidelines that can be easily adapted and integrated in the software development 
process
Non-expert
Software Engineer
speaker: SYSTEM
